amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the Department of Homeland Security has procurement goals for small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 107-615 to ensure that the Department of Homeland Security has procurement goals for small businesses that are no less than the statutory minimum; and to ensure that those employees responsible for this goal attainment have a corresponding criteria in their performance evaluations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
